attributes.action: Evict high earners from council housing
attributes.additional_details:
"Bob Crow, the general secretary of the RMT union, lives in a taxpayer-subsidised house despite earning £145,000."

When your alarm rings in the morning and it's time to get out of bed and go to work - when it's cold and dark outside, and you don't really feel like it - remember that your taxes are paying to subsidise Bob Crow's rent, despite the fact he probably earns more than you.

If that bothers you, please sign this petition
